manifest.name: Continuous Mode
manifest.description: Displays all open notes in a tab group as if they were a continuous scrollable document (sometimes called "Scrivenings mode"). Open all notes in Continuous Mode from a folder, search results, or links in a file or Dataview/query block; use arrow keys to navigate between notes; display notes in “Compact Mode” similar to Evernote or Bear; reorder notes via tab header drag-and-drop, sorting, more.
manifest.author: Michael Schrauzer

data.manifestValue: Displays all open notes in a tab group as if they were a continuous scrollable document (sometimes called "Scrivenings mode"). Open all notes in Continuous Mode from a folder, search results, or links in a file or Dataview/query block; use arrow keys to navigate between notes; display notes in “Compact Mode” similar to Evernote or Bear; reorder notes via tab header drag-and-drop, sorting, more.
data.communityListValue: Displays all open notes in a tab group as a continuous scrollable page (sometimes called Scrivenings mode).
